data.name: SqlCeConnectionUIControl_InvalidConnectionProperties
data.value: The connection properties object must be of type SqlCeConnectionProperties.

data.name: Reg_NotifyService
data.value: PlatformService: {0}

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_DataSource
data.value: The file path and name of the SQL Server Compact database.

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_Password
data.value: The database password, which can be up to 40 characters in length.

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_Source
data.value: Source

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_Security
data.value: Security

data.name: SqlConnectionSupport_UnrecognizedProviderObject
data.value: The specified provider object is not a System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.

data.name: SqlConnectionUIControl_BrowseFileTitle
data.value: Select SQL Server Compact {0} Database File

data.name: SqlConnectionUIControl_BrowseFileFilter
data.value: SQL Server Compact {0} Databases (*.sdf)|*.sdf|All Files (*.*)|*.*

data.name: SqlConnectionUIControl_BrowseFileDefaultExt
data.value: sdf;

data.name: SqlConnectionUIControl_ConnectionFailed
data.value: Connection Failed

data.name: SqlDataParameter_ParseNotImplemented
data.value: Parsing values of SqlDbType {0} is not implemented.

data.name: BadSite
data.value: The {0} object was incorrectly sited.

data.name: SqlCeConnectionProperties_FileNeedsUpgrading
data.value: The selected database was created with an earlier version of SQL Server Compact and needs to be upgraded to SQL Server Compact 3.5 before the connection can be opened or tested. Upgrade the database by creating a new data connection and completing the Add Connection dialog box.

data.name: SqlCeConnectionProperties_FileNeedsRepair
data.value: The selected database file may be corrupted. Run the repair ultility to check the database or repair the database by creating a new data connection and completing the Add Connection dialog box.

data.name: SqlCeConnectionProperties_MustSpecifyDataSource
data.value: This connection cannot be tested because no database file has been specified.

data.name: SqlCeConnectionProperties_DeviceNotSupported
data.value: This version of Visual Studio does not support creating connection to the database files on a mobile device.

data.name: SqlCeConnectionProperties_DatabaseCorruptNeedsRepair
data.value: The specified file is either not a valid SQL Server Compact file or it is corrupted. Would you like to repair it?

data.name: SqlCeConnectionProperties_DatabaseCorruptNeedsRepairTitle
data.value: Repair SQL Server Compact Database

data.name: SqlCeObjectEnumerator_InvalidParameters
data.value: The parameters to EnumerateObjects are invalid.

data.name: SqlCeDataObjectIdentifierConverter_InvalidIdentifier
data.value: The specified identifier is in an invalid format.

data.name: SqlCeDataObjectIdentifierConverter_InvalidType
data.value: The type "{0}" was not found.

data.name: DataProvider_SqlEverywhere
data.value: .NET Framework Data Provider for Microsoft SQL Server Compact {0}

data.name: DataProvider_SqlEverywhere_Description
data.value: Use this data provider to connect to a Microsoft SQL Server Compact {0} database file.

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_PersistSecurityInfo
data.value: Returns security-sensitive information like password as part of the connection (Default is false).

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_MaxDatabaseSize
data.value: The maximum size of the database, in MB (Default 128).

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_Advanced
data.value: Advanced

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_Initialization
data.value: Initialization

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_EncryptionMode
data.value: Specifies the encryption of the database file (Default mode is platform default).

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_AutoshrinkThreshold
data.value: The percent of free space in the database file that is allowed before autoshrink begins (Default is 60).

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_DefaultLockEscalation
data.value: The number of locks a transaction will acquire before attempting escalation from row to page, or from page to table (Default is 100).

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_LocaleIdentifier
data.value: The locale ID (LCID) to use with the database.

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_TempFileDirectory
data.value: The location of the temporary database.
